 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּן‎</span>] **noun [masculine and]** **feminine**<sup>[[Lam.4.3|Lam 4:3]]</sup> ==jackal== (so most; [[BDB#Tristr|Tr]]<sup>NHB 109 ff., 263 f.</sup> Shipley-[[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>Ency. Bib. JACKAL</sup>; but ***wolf*** [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Hast. DB DRAGON</sup>, compare [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>[[Isa.13.22|Isa 13:22]] and</sup> (rare) Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּים‎</span> [[Mic.1.8|Mic 1:8]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּין‎</span> [[Lam.4.3|Lam 4:3]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:87e»§ 87e</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְתַנּוֺת‎</span> [[Mal.1.3|Mal 1:3]] (si vera lectio; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others interpret = ***dwellings***, [[BDB#Sta|Sta]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] conjecture <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְאוֺת‎</span>, [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָתַתִּי לְ‎</span>); — ***jackal***, howling mournfully in waste places, [[Mic.1.8|Mic 1:8]]; [[Job.30.29|Job 30:29]] (both \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנוֺת יַעֲנָה‎</span>), [[Isa.13.22|Isa 13:22]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִיִּים‎</span>), in desert also [[Isa.43.20|Isa 43:20]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנוֺת יַעֲנָה‎</span>); deserted sites called <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעוֺן ת‎</span> [[Jer.9.10|Jer 9:10]]; [[Jer.10.22|Jer 10:22]]; [[Jer.49.33|Jer 49:33]]; [[Jer.51.37|Jer 51:37]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְוֵה ת‎</span> [[Isa.34.13|Isa 34:13]]; [[Isa.35.7|Isa 35:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקוֺם ת‎</span> Psalms; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדְבָּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Mal.1.3|Mal 1:3]] (si vera lectio, but see above); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> as snuffing up wind [[Jer.14.6|Jer 14:6]], giving suck [[Lam.4.3|Lam 4:3]].
